<div id="readme" class="md" data-path="README.md"><article class="markdown-body entry-content container-lg" itemprop="text"><p dir="auto"><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="misc/popgencore.png"><img src="misc/popgencore.png" alt="logo" style="max-width: 100%;"></a>
This package contains the core utilities required by <a href="https://github.com/biojulia/PopGen.jl">PopGen.jl</a>, which includes the <code>PopData</code> and <code>Genotype</code> data types, their associated utilities, and file reading/writing.</p>
